challenge: The "Nike RPA Pre-order Automation Order Management" project's core challenge was automating the entire lifecycle of Liverpool team jersey pre-orders. This involved ensuring precision in data collection and payment verification, mastering dynamic order status management with auto-cancellation, and maintaining seamless customer communication via automated emails. The key was to deliver unwavering reliability and real-time visibility through a Power BI dashboard, all to maximize efficiency during high-volume periods.
solution: The solution is an RPA-powered Pre-order Automation System for Nike's Liverpool team jerseys, built to resolve the complexities of manual order management. This system automates the entire pre-order lifecycle, from collecting order data via Microsoft Forms and processing payment verifications to dynamically managing order statuses with automated email notifications at each step. It also features auto-cancellation capabilities and delivers real-time order insights through a Power BI dashboard, significantly boosting operational efficiency, accuracy, and customer communication while minimizing manual intervention.
